verses.name: 1 Chronicles 25:24
verses.text: The seventeenth to Joshbekashah, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 25:25
verses.text: The eighteenth to Hanani, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 25:26
verses.text: The nineteenth to Mallothi, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 25:27
verses.text: The twentieth to Eliathah, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 25:28
verses.text: The one and twentieth to Hothir, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 25:29
verses.text: The two and twentieth to Giddalti, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 25:30
verses.text: The three and twentieth to Mahazioth, he, his sons, and his brethren, were twelve:
